text: @parscale @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The only Trump face mask you'd ever find me wearing is this. With the current U.S. COVID-19 death toll at 78,615 — 90% of whom might still be alive today if not for that sociopath's ignorance and arrogance — it's the fashion accessory all patriotic Americans should be wearing. https://t.co/o18d83bNwg
